title: Run Now
content: Let vitality burst, dance youth; Let the blood boil, play with life; Let the limbs work, the whole body movement; Let the body strong, the national fitness. National Fitness Day, participate in fitness, physical fitness, longevity boundless.

title: Keep Exercise
content: You trot I walk, fitness and happy way. You kick the ball, I throw blue, exercise with sports. He sings and she dances, singing and dancing together. The whole people join to keep fit, strengthen the body with health. National Fitness Day: Wish everyone healthy, happy and colorful!

title: Youth
content: Youth is singing, life is jubilant! More exercise on weekdays, away from sub-health! The quality of life is high, and the people are asking for everything. Don't forget to exercise well! And to August 8, fitness Qi mobilization, longevity over a hundred years!

title: Exercise
content: Exercise can take the place of medicine, but all drugs can't take the place of exercise.

title: Health
content: The body is like a machine. If it does not move for a long time, it will rust, and if it does not maintain it, it will age. Exercise is a lubricant, which can enhance the flexibility and flexibility of the joints, which can ensure long-term health.

title: Hill
content: He who cannot manage his own body is not qualified to manage others; A man who manages his health badly, how to manage his business well.
